title: Number of hospitals in Canada by province 2016
summary: This bar chart has 13 columns on the x axis representing Month, and Number of establishments in each Month on the y axis.
The maximum Number of establishments 492.0 is found at Month Ontario and the minimum is found at Yukon where Month is 1.0.
The difference of Number of establishments between the highest and lowest Month is 491.0.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Number of establishments in the y axis.
The maximum Number of establishments 492.0 is found at Month Ontario and the minimum is found at Yukon where Month is 1.0.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 13 columns on the x axis representing Month, and Number of establishments in each Month on the y axis.
The maximum Number of establishments 492.0 is found at Month Ontario and the minimum is found at Yukon where Month is 1.0.

max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of establishments for 13 number of Months.
Month Ontario has the highest Number of establishments and Yukon has the lowest Number of establishments.
Second maximum Number of establishments is found at Month .
There is a difference of 491.0 between the maximum Month Ontario and minimum Month Yukon.
Month Ontario is higher than any other Months with value 492.0, followed by , and British Columbia. Down to Month Yukon with the lowest value 1.0.
The Number of establishments has reduced over the past 13 Months.
Month Northwest Territories, and Nunavut have the same Number of establishments.
The lowest value 1.0 at Yukon is almost 4.36 times smaller than the average value 112.77.
The Number of establishments is 1466.0 if we add up values of all Months.
